settings.label: HIT US UP
settings.title: LET'S TALK
settings.description: Got questions about a drop? Want to collab? Slide into our inbox and we'll get back to you ASAP.

settings.question: When's the next drop?
settings.answer: Follow us on socials and join the newsletter. That's where we announce everything first. If you're late, you're gonna miss out.

settings.question: Do you do collabs?
settings.answer: Always down to work with dope artists and creators. Hit us up with your portfolio and ideas. Let's make something fire.

settings.question: Why did my size sell out so fast?
settings.answer: We keep runs limited on purpose. Quality over quantity. Sign up for notifications to get first dibs on the next drop.

settings.question: Do you restock sold out items?
settings.answer: Rarely. When a drop is gone, it's gone. That's what makes each piece special. Sometimes we do anniversary restocks though.
